titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a Secretary of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a Secretary of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the House of Representatives be informed of the election of Jackie Barber as Secretary of the Senate.
